projects.title: My Portfolio Website
projects.description: My portfolio website. Made fully responsive with bootstrap.

projects.title: Online multiplayer card-game
projects.description: Care-for-some-tea-saboteur is an online multiplayer card-game with a steampunk theme. Game can be downloaded from the web (website is offline). It features a full game, a website and an API. This served as my MBO graduation project.

projects.title: Recycle bin cleaner
projects.description: Removes specific files from the recycle bin based on user input.

projects.title: PHP school assignment
projects.description: A simple sign up form for a Hearthstone tournament. This was an assignment for school.

projects.title: Easy Calculator
projects.description: A calculator specifically designed to make a lot of calculations by hand.
